verses.name: Matthew 27:48
verses.text: And straightway one of them ran, and took a spunge, and filled it with vinegar, and put it on a reed, and gave him to drink.

verses.name: Matthew 27:49
verses.text: The rest said, Let be, let us see whether Elias will come to save him.

verses.name: Matthew 27:50
verses.text: Jesus, when he had cried again with a loud voice, yielded up the ghost.

verses.name: Matthew 27:51
verses.text: And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;

verses.name: Matthew 27:52
verses.text: And the graves were opened; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose,
